content: this cozy and lightweight skinny scarf is the perfect beginner-friendly project made with luxuriously soft cardiff cashmere classic and finished with a playful pop of color at one end designed to wrap once or twice around your neck it s all about simple stitches and effortless style share your work and spread the knitting inspiration #cashmereskinnyscarf @lillelarsenlux **size** one size 125 x 30 cm 50 x 12 **yarn** cardiff cashmere classic 100% cashmere 25 g = 112 m / 122 yds main colour mc 303 touch 1 skein contrast colour cc 662 marylin 1 skein **needles & materials** 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles 60 - 80 cm 24 - 32 in length tapestry needle **gauge** approx 22 sts x 30 row = 10 x 10 cm in stockinette stitch on 3 5 mm us 4 needles gauge is not essential for this project however keep in mind that working at a different gauge will affect the final size of the scarf it may turn out wider or narrower you may also need to adjust the frequency of the increases to achieve the intended proportions find all the tutorials to the basic techniques on my youtube channel 1 1 https //www youtube com/@lillelarsenlux
